function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of comprehensive pandemic-related considerations in the paper","Impact":"Increased risk of missing key factors in controlling contagious diseases in the built environment","Mitigation":"Review and update the guidelines to include a more comprehensive list of pandemic-related considerations","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Construction practitioners and researchers","Owner":"Authors of the paper"},{"Description":"Reliance on current COVID-19 pandemic for research topics","Impact":"Limitation in addressing other potential future pandemics or epidemics","Mitigation":"Adapt and expand the research topics to be applicable to a broader range of pandemics or epidemics","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Practitioners and researchers","Owner":"Authors of the paper"}]}
